title: Penalties And Analytics
description:
Welcome back to (debatable) with hosts Pablo Torre and Domonique Foxworth featuring Spencer Hall and David Jacoby! On today's show: What do you make of the penalties and analytic-driven decision-making from the Raiders-Chiefs game? Was Ron Rivera wrong to throw Carson Wentz under the bus? Do you view Ohio State as the favorite now in college football? Plus, we break down Matt Rhule to Nebraska rumors, Warriors drama, and video of Ben Simmons attempting to shoot!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Raiders-Chiefs Interesting Decision Making, Analyzing Roughing The Passer
